targets.query:
gapData = from(bucket: "data")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "gapToLeader")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "GapToLeader")
  |> last()
  |> group()
  |> keep(columns: ["driver", "_value"])
  
intervalData = from(bucket: "data")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "intervalToPositionAhead")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "IntervalToPositionAhead")
  |> last()
  |> group()
  |> keep(columns: ["driver", "_value"])

lastLapData = from(bucket: "data")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "lastLapTime")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "LastLapTime")
  |> last()
  |> group()
  |> keep(columns: ["driver", "_value"])
  
intermediateJoinData = join(
    tables: {gap:gapData, interval:intervalData},
    on: ["driver"],
)
join(
    tables: {intermediateJoin:intermediateJoinData, lastLap:lastLapData},
    on: ["driver"],
) |> sort(columns: ["_value_gap"])
  |> fill(column: "position", value: 1.0)
  |> cumulativeSum(columns: ["position"])
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with gap: r._value_gap * 1000.0 }))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with interval: r._value_interval * 1000.0 }))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with lastLap: r._value * 1000.0 }))

from(bucket: "data")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "lastLapTime")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "LastLapTime")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["driver"] =~ /${Drivers:regex}/)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with lastLap: r._value * 1000.0}))
  |> keep(columns: ["driver", "lastLap", "_time"])

from(bucket: "data")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "speedTrap")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["driver"] =~ /${Drivers:regex}/)

from(bucket: "data")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "gapToLeader")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "GapToLeader")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["driver"] =~ /${Drivers:regex}/)

from(bucket: "data")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "weatherData")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "AirTemp"  or r["_field"] == "TrackTemp" or r["_field"] == "WindSpeed" or r["_field"] == "Rainfall")

list.definition:
from(bucket: "data")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "lastLapTime")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "LastLapTime")
  |> group(columns: ["driver"])
  |> distinct(column: "driver")
  |> keep(columns: ["_value"])
list.label: driver
list.name: Drivers
list.query:
from(bucket: "data")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "lastLapTime")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "LastLapTime")
  |> group(columns: ["driver"])
  |> distinct(column: "driver")
  |> keep(columns: ["_value"])
